PRODUCT UPDATES

We have so many awesome updates in this product roundup. Let's jump right in:

********************************
Your best reviews, now in motion
********************************

********************************
Your best reviews, now in motion
********************************

( https://help.loox.io/support/solutions/articles/501000224589-loox-s-dynamic-carousel )

Meet the Dynamic Carousel, our newest widget that turns your most powerful social proof into an interactive, swipeable experience shoppers can’t miss.

Learn more ( https://help.loox.io/support/solutions/articles/501000224589-loox-s-dynamic-carousel )

*******************************************
Turn glowing reviews into (even) more sales
*******************************************

*******************************************
Turn glowing reviews into (even) more sales
*******************************************

( https://help.loox.io/support/solutions/articles/501000234832-loox-studio-customize-reviews-for-social )
Transform customer reviews into engaging visual content for your brand in a click. Loox Studio helps you amplify your best reviews and share customer stories effortlessly, so that you can build trust and boost sales in no time.

Learn more ( https://help.loox.io/support/solutions/articles/501000234832-loox-studio-customize-reviews-for-social )( https://help.loox.io/support/solutions/articles/501000162419-loox-snippets-widget )You may have noticed that your Snippets widget has some new functionality (if you haven't installed it, what are you waiting for?). Snippets now support multi-language translations, product grouping, and RTL text.

Learn more ( https://help.loox.io/support/solutions/articles/501000162419-loox-snippets-widget )( https://help.loox.io/support/solutions/articles/501000162507-integrating-loox-with-klaviyo )
You can now configure automatic emails to be sent to customers from your Klaviyo account based on reviews submitted through Loox. This opens up a world of possibilities for your email and SMS marketing.

Learn more ( https://help.loox.io/support/solutions/articles/501000162507-integrating-loox-with-klaviyo )( https://help.loox.io/support/solutions/articles/501000162365-exclude-specific-orders-customers-or-products-from-receiving-loox-emails )Have specific subscription products you don't want to send reviews for every time they're shipped? You can now block review requests to  subscription orders. 

Learn more ( https://help.loox.io/support/solutions/articles/501000162365-exclude-specific-orders-customers-or-products-from-receiving-loox-emails )( https://help.loox.io/support/solutions/articles/501000162520-managing-reviews#more-actions-0-10 )
Need to move reviews to another product? Now you can move reviews from product to product in bulk, directly from within your admin in just a few clicks.

Learn more ( https://help.loox.io/support/solutions/articles/501000162520-managing-reviews#more-actions-0-10 )

********************
Ask for review edits
********************

********************
Ask for review edits
********************

( https://help.loox.io/support/solutions/articles/501000162398-editing-reviews-by-customers )
Now, when you resolve an issue for a customer, you can ask them to update their feedback. This ensures your reviews stay accurate and demonstrates to new shoppers that you actively address feedback. It’s also perfect for customers who want to fix a typo or add a photo or video to their original text-only review.

Learn more ( https://help.loox.io/support/solutions/articles/501000162398-editing-reviews-by-customers )( https://help.loox.io/support/solutions/articles/501000162480-offering-a-discount-for-photo-video-reviews )Give your customers the option to use Loox and Shopify discounts at the same time at checkout.

Learn more ( https://help.loox.io/support/solutions/articles/501000162480-offering-a-discount-for-photo-video-reviews )( https://help.loox.io/support/solutions/articles/501000262633-thank-you-emails )
Make it your own! From banners to texts, enjoy a new layer of customization for your thank you emails.

Learn more ( https://help.loox.io/support/solutions/articles/501000262633-thank-you-emails )( https://help.loox.io/support/solutions/articles/501000162471-collect-and-display-store-reviews )You can now reply to store reviews as well as product reviews to further enhance engagement with your customers.

Learn more ( https://help.loox.io/support/solutions/articles/501000162471-collect-and-display-store-reviews )( https://help.loox.io/support/solutions/articles/501000162436-review-transparency )
You can now automatically disclose the source and incentive for reviews with badges, toggled from within your admin.

Learn more ( https://help.loox.io/support/solutions/articles/501000162436-review-transparency )PARTNER OF THE MONTH

Have you ever wondered how shoppers interact with your review widgets? Our integration with Lucky Orange gives you the visibility you’ve been missing:

See how visitors behave around pages with Loox widgets, filter insights by segments, and trigger targeted campaigns to high-intent visitors who engaged with reviews but didn’t convert.
